word_mean: 心动过速，心搏过速：一般指心率超逾100／分，可区分为房性、交接处(结性)和室性，其发生可为阵发性

sentence.Network_en: Tachycardia may result from pain, apprehension, hypoventilation, or hypovolemia.
sentence.Network_cn: 心动过速可由于疼痛 、 恐惧 、 通气不足或低血容量引起.

sentence.Network_en: The patient has dyspnea, tachycardia, and cyanosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 病人呼吸困难, 心动过数及发绀.

sentence.Network_en: With atropine, ocular effects are accompanied by tachycardia.
sentence.Network_cn: 用阿托品则产生眼效应,并伴有心率加快.
